title: Software Developer
description: Designs, develops, and maintains software applications.

title: Data Scientist
description: Analyzes and interprets complex data to help organizations make decisions.

title: Mechanical Engineer
description: Designs, builds, and tests mechanical devices, including tools, engines, and machines.

title: Doctor (MBBS)
description: Diagnoses and treats illnesses and injuries, and provides preventive care.

title: Chartered Accountant (CA)
description: Manages finances, provides financial advice, and helps with auditing and taxation.

title: Marketing Manager
description: Develops and implements marketing strategies to promote products or services.

title: UX/UI Designer
description: Creates user-friendly interfaces that enable users to understand how to use complex technical products.

title: Civil Engineer
description: Designs, constructs, and maintains infrastructure projects in the public and private sector.

title: Architect
description: Plans and designs buildings and other structures, combining art and science.

title: Civil Servant (IAS/IPS)
description: Works in public administration, implementing government policies and managing departments.

title: Lawyer
description: Advises and represents clients in legal matters, both civil and criminal.

title: Cybersecurity Analyst
description: Protects computer networks and systems from security breaches and cyberattacks.
